name: MiniDrift
description:
MiniDrift is a one-button racing game. 
He was conceived as part of a school project (Isart Digital).

The goal is simple, fulfill contracts by finishing the race within a set time. 

I wanted an accessible and very pleasant drift game to play. With a program curve specific to each player. My goal was to frustrate the least posible player and having no direct malus in the game and that bonuses that allow the players to save time.

The voice line is on fench only so i apologize about that.
